You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

In addition to common actions, you can erson, intess and snemic.

Your goal for this game is: Put the tisof in the torhy, the book on the rialiced and the plate on the rialiced.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a rot now. There are a torhy, a bed, a tisof and a book. The torhy is closed. The tisof is on the bed. The book is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
